Heading: And my god
Text:
Is superiorty complex actually any good ? I mean I remeber I was in my 3rd sem and my batch mate told me that superiority complex is somewhat good. And now moroever I do not get the point there was a tamil local in his 2nd year, I had no fucking idea that I would even talk to him but then again he started at me like "Oh you are big shot or what" and that is fucking my head so much like what is this with small town mentality. Fuck bro we in a smoking room of a bar whats the deal w you, enjoy your beer and lmk have my jagger shot cheap fuck. Behenchod it's so fucking numbing my brain rn as if I really do want to take action, but no point as I would take action I'm no better than him. And I have lived that superiority complex life and till a point I was fine but it does no good for anyone. I guess it's just village propogandic mentality here. 

So SDN, hmm don't feel like studying this, since I got a cheatcode of keeping phone. Bad habit, really fucks you for sem exam, like maybe the feeling is good but at end you know it's wrong and that's something we should never forget diff b/w right nd wrong. Because many people have. I want to get this making up scenarious out my head as it just fuels my anger more nd more. No cause 

Now in my final year I have started to remember more about as to who am I, cause fights and anger is constant and situation which you may get post that anger that's something we can have a charge about because think, our anger is expressesed through our high pitch voice, bad expressions hand movement. So if we just control these expressions then our anger is still with us and accordingly we can act upon the situation in a more better manner, because then the other person is convienced we are not angry so no harm right. Then we can manipulate or do fuck one latter cause the person will not think when they'll speak, and thats' what we want, that other person not thinking before speaking as then we can get information out one, maybe even get one to say wrong things which are against one morals. Hence patience is very important fs fs

Heading: Kon kho 9:55 pm
Text:
I guess writing in silence is more better as it does not give any emotions out of hand and just brings what you were feeling before, I mean that's the case with me. Recently it was Diwali 25' nd my god so much drama I saw every where. And it just made me question as to why drama happens around me and not with me, as then people told me I radiate energy, now I mean i get it that I'm fun. Like I never got bored with me anywho I guess this is a narcistic behaviour, but I'm not the one with a psychology degree. 

10:44 

So okay I have taken another impulsive decision which can cost me latter on. Not sure how but surely can, I think in a few days will be a good time when I change my number from the present one, since I just cannot handle people's expectations from me for a illegal thing and it saddens me more as to what purpose I hold in people's life. I will slowly start producing on particular set of events which has occured with me over time, and while I write it please remember there's another side of what might have happened as well, it;s just my perception of things. As like in recent I got homeless not fun for sure but yes a drive. I feel somewhat alone but at the same time it's not too much alone it's just fine actually. Reason I brought up this blog is to capture me and my ideas as to who am I. My end term goal which I think will take atleast a year is to get a AI personalised as me so that people can talk to me just like everyday to that AI with my personallity. It for sure is stupid but as is a 3 year old kid capturing and learning from it's surroundings.
